prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that floats gracefully with flowing tentacle-like appendages.
I want to see a water-type Pokemon with soft pink and purple colors, resembling a jellyfish.
Generate a cute, aquatic Pokemon with an elegant shape and a spectral appearance.
Make a whimsical ghost-type Pokemon that has a gentle demeanor and mesmerizing features.
Imagine a Pokemon with a ghostly appearance and flowing fins, perfect for underwater exploration.
Design a Pokemon that combines both water and ghost types, showcasing beautiful pastel colors.
Give me an enchanting Pokemon that drifts through the ocean, with delicate, translucent limbs.
